Option.name: -nobak
Option.Description: Do not include backup files

Option.name: -no-bak
Option.Description: Do not include backup files

Option.name: -abstract
Option.Description: Set Abstract filename

Option.name: -A
Option.Description: Set Application ID

Option.name: -biblio
Option.Description: Set Bibliographic filename

Option.name: -cache-inodes
Option.Description: Cache inodes (needed to detect hard links)

Option.name: -no-cache-inodes
Option.Description: Do not cache inodes (if filesystem has no unique unides)

Option.name: -check-oldnames
Option.Description: Check all imported ISO9660 names from old session

Option.name: -check-session
Option.Description: Check all ISO9660 names from previous session

Option.name: -copyright
Option.Description: Set Copyright filename

Option.name: -debug
Option.Description: Set debug flag

Option.name: -b
Option.Description: Set El Torito boot image name

Option.name: -eltorito-alt-boot
Option.Description: Start specifying alternative El Torito boot parameters

Option.name: -B
Option.Description: Set sparc boot image names

Option.name: -G
Option.Description: Set generic boot image name

Option.name: -sparc-label
Option.Description: Set sparc boot disk label

Option.name: -c
Option.Description: Set El Torito boot catalog name

Option.name: -C
Option.Description: Magic paramters from cdrecord

Option.name: -d
Option.Description: Omit trailing periods from filenames (violates ISO9660)

Option.name: -dir-mode
Option.Description: Make the mode of all directories this mode.

Option.name: -D
Option.Description: Disable deep directory relocation (violates ISO9660)

Option.name: -file-mode
Option.Description: Make the mode of all plain files this mode.

Option.name: -f
Option.Description: Follow symbolic links

Option.name: -gid
Option.Description: Make the group owner of all files this gid.

Option.name: -graft-points
Option.Description: Allow to use graft points for filenames

Option.name: -help
Option.Description: Print option help

Option.name: -hide
Option.Description: Hide ISO9660/RR file

Option.name: -hide-list
Option.Description: File with list of ISO9660/RR files to hide

Option.name: -hidden
Option.Description: Set hidden attribute on ISO9660 file

Option.name: -hidden-list
Option.Description: File with list of ISO9660 files with hidden attribute

Option.name: -hide-joliet
Option.Description: Hide Joliet file

Option.name: -hide-joliet-list
Option.Description: File with list of Joliet files to hide

Option.name: -hide-joliet-trans-tbl
Option.Description: Hide TRANS.TBL from Joliet tree

Option.name: -hide-rr-moved
Option.Description: Rename RR_MOVED to .rr_moved in Rock Ridge tree

Option.name: -input-charset
Option.Description: Local input charset for file name conversion

Option.name: -output-charset
Option.Description: Output charset for file name conversion

Option.name: -iso-level
Option.Description: Set ISO9660 conformance level (1..3) or 4 for ISO9660 version 2

Option.name: -J
Option.Description: Generate Joliet directory information

Option.name: -joliet-long
Option.Description: Allow Joliet file names to be 103 Unicode characters

Option.name: -jcharset
Option.Description: Local charset for Joliet directory information

Option.name: -l
Option.Description: Allow full 31 character filenames for ISO9660 names

Option.name: -max-iso9660-filenames
Option.Description: Allow 37 character filenames for ISO9660 names (violates ISO9660)

Option.name: -L
Option.Description: Allow ISO9660 filenames to start with '.' (violates ISO9660)

Option.name: -log-file
Option.Description: Re-direct messages to LOG_FILE

Option.name: -m
Option.Description: Exclude file name

Option.name: -exclude-list
Option.Description: File with list of file names to exclude

Option.name: -pad
Option.Description: Pad output to a multiple of 32k (default)

Option.name: -no-pad
Option.Description: Do not pad output to a multiple of 32k

Option.name: -M
Option.Description: Set path to previous session to merge

Option.name: -N
Option.Description: Omit version number from ISO9660 filename (violates ISO9660)

Option.name: -new-dir-mode
Option.Description: Mode used when creating new directories

Option.name: -force-rr
Option.Description: Inhibit automatic Rock Ridge detection for previous session

Option.name: -no-rr
Option.Description: Inhibit reading of Rock Ridge attributes from previous session

Option.name: -no-split-symlink-components
Option.Description: Inhibit splitting symlink components

Option.name: -no-split-symlink-fields
Option.Description: Inhibit splitting symlink fields

Option.name: -path-list
Option.Description: File with list of pathnames to process

Option.name: -p
Option.Description: Set Volume preparer

Option.name: -print-size
Option.Description: Print estimated filesystem size and exit

Option.name: -P
Option.Description: Set Volume publisher

Option.name: -quiet
Option.Description: Run quietly

Option.name: -r
Option.Description: Alternative option: -rational-rock. Generate rationalized Rock Ridge directory information

Option.name: -R
Option.Description: Alternative option: -rock. Generate Rock Ridge directory information

Option.name: -s
Option.Description: Alternative option: -sectype. Set output sector type to e.g. data/xa1/raw

Option.name: -sort
Option.Description: Sort file content locations according to rules in FILE

Option.name: -split-output
Option.Description: Split output into files of approx. 1GB size

Option.name: -stream-file-name
Option.Description: Set the stream file ISO9660 name (incl. version)

Option.name: -stream-media-size
Option.Description: Set the size of your CD media in sectors

Option.name: -sysid
Option.Description: Set System ID

Option.name: -T
Option.Description: Alternative option: -translation-table. Generate translation tables for systems that don't understand long filenames

Option.name: -table-name
Option.Description: Translation table file name

Option.name: -ucs-level
Option.Description: Set Joliet UCS level (1..3)

Option.name: -udf
Option.Description: Generate UDF file system

Option.name: -dvd-video
Option.Description: Generate DVD-Video compliant UDF file system

Option.name: -uid
Option.Description: Make the owner of all files this uid

Option.name: -U
Option.Description: Alternative option: -untranslated-filenames. Allow Untranslated filenames (for HPUX AIX - violates ISO9660). Forces -l, -d, -L, -N, -relaxed-filenames, -allow-lowercase, -allow-multidot

Option.name: -relaxed-filenames
Option.Description: Allow 7 bit ASCII except lower case characters (violates ISO9660)

Option.name: -no-iso-translate
Option.Description: Do not translate illegal ISO characters '~', '-' and '#' (violates ISO9660)

Option.name: -allow-lowercase
Option.Description: Allow lower case characters in addition to the current character set (violates ISO9660)

Option.name: -allow-multidot
Option.Description: Allow more than one dot in filenames (e.g. .tar.gz) (violates ISO9660)

Option.name: -use-fileversion
Option.Description: Use file version # from filesystem

Option.name: -v
Option.Description: Alternative option: -verbose. Verbose

Option.name: -version
Option.Description: Print the current version

Option.name: -V
Option.Description: Alternative option: -volid. Set Volume ID

Option.name: -volset
Option.Description: Set Volume set ID

Option.name: -volset-size
Option.Description: Set Volume set size

Option.name: -volset-seqno
Option.Description: Set Volume set sequence number

Option.name: -x
Option.Description: Alternative option: -old-exclude. Exclude file name(depreciated)

Option.name: -hard-disk-boot
Option.Description: Boot image is a hard disk image

Option.name: -no-emul-boot
Option.Description: Boot image is 'no emulation' image

Option.name: -no-boot
Option.Description: Boot image is not bootable

Option.name: -boot-load-seg
Option.Description: Set load segment for boot image

Option.name: -boot-load-size
Option.Description: Set numbers of load sectors

Option.name: -boot-info-table
Option.Description: Patch boot image with info table

Option.name: -XA
Option.Description: Generate XA directory attruibutes

Option.name: -xa
Option.Description: Generate rationalized XA directory attruibutes

Option.name: -z
Option.Description: Alternative option: -transparent-compression. Enable transparent compression of files

Option.name: -hfs-type
Option.Description: Set HFS default TYPE

Option.name: -hfs-creator
Option.Description: Set HFS default CREATOR

Option.name: -g
Option.Description: Alternative option: -apple. Add Apple ISO9660 extensions

Option.name: -h
Option.Description: Alternative option: -hfs. Create ISO9660/HFS hybrid

Option.name: -H
Option.Description: Alternative option: -map MAPPING. Map file extensions to HFS TYPE/CREATOR

Option.name: -magic
Option.Description: Magic file for HFS TYPE/CREATOR

Option.name: -probe
Option.Description: Probe all files for Apple/Unix file types

Option.name: -mac-name
Option.Description: Use Macintosh name for ISO9660/Joliet/RockRidge file name

Option.name: -no-mac-files
Option.Description: Do not look for Unix/Mac files (depreciated)

Option.name: -boot-hfs-file
Option.Description: Set HFS boot image name

Option.name: -part
Option.Description: Generate HFS partition table

Option.name: -cluster-size
Option.Description: Cluster size for PC Exchange Macintosh files

Option.name: -auto
Option.Description: Set HFS AutoStart file name

Option.name: -no-desktop
Option.Description: Do not create the HFS (empty) Desktop files

Option.name: -hide-hfs
Option.Description: Hide HFS file

Option.name: -hide-hfs-list
Option.Description: List of HFS files to hide

Option.name: -hfs-volid
Option.Description: Volume name for the HFS partition

Option.name: -icon-position
Option.Description: Keep HFS icon position

Option.name: -root-info
Option.Description: Finderinfo for root folder

Option.name: -input-hfs-charset
Option.Description: Local input charset for HFS file name conversion

Option.name: -output-hfs-charset
Option.Description: Output charset for HFS file name conversion

Option.name: -hfs-unlock
Option.Description: Leave HFS Volume unlocked

Option.name: -hfs-bless
Option.Description: Name of Folder to be blessed

Option.name: -hfs-parms
Option.Description: Comma separated list of HFS parameters

Option.name: -prep-boot
Option.Description: PReP boot image file -- up to 4 are allowed

Option.name: --cap
Option.Description: Look for AUFS CAP Macintosh files

Option.name: --netatalk
Option.Description: Look for NETATALK Macintosh files

Option.name: --double
Option.Description: Look for AppleDouble Macintosh files

Option.name: --ethershare
Option.Description: Look for Helios EtherShare Macintosh files

Option.name: --exchange
Option.Description: Look for PC Exchange Macintosh files

Option.name: --sgi
Option.Description: Look for SGI Macintosh files

Option.name: --macbin
Option.Description: Look for MacBinary Macintosh files

Option.name: --single
Option.Description: Look for AppleSingle Macintosh files

Option.name: --ushare
Option.Description: Look for IPT UShare Macintosh files

Option.name: --xinet
Option.Description: Look for XINET Macintosh files

Option.name: --dave
Option.Description: Look for DAVE Macintosh files

Option.name: --sfm
Option.Description: Look for SFM Macintosh files

Option.name: --osx-double
Option.Description: Look for MacOS X AppleDouble Macintosh files

Option.name: --osx-hfs
Option.Description: Look for MacOS X HFS Macintosh files
